data.name: Lost In The Storm
data.detailed_description:
" Though we experience every kind of pressure, we’re not crushed. At times we don’t know what to do, but quitting is not an option. We are persecuted by others, but God has not forsaken us. We may be knocked down, but not out."
2 Corinthians 4:8-9 TPT

What is Lost In The Storm?

Lost in the Storm is a Single-player adventure game with a little bit of mystery, action, and puzzle elements in between.

Story


You're playing Andrew Banks,

A man who is currently very lost in his life because of a tragic event that took place 10 years ago. Which ends up putting him in a deep coma. Now he must travel through his deep subconscious to figure out how to wake up. But it won’t be easy. Andrew will have to face the inner darkness inside his heart and soon, have to confront what really happened 10 years ago. Will he escape the storm and wake up or never see the light again.

THE LIGHT




During the beginning of Andrew's adventure he is given, a very important tool from a friend to help him wake up from his coma, The Lantern Of Light And Soul.
The light is used for many things

- The light can display how well Andrew is doing



- The light can guide you through the darkness



-The light can solve puzzles and clear paths



-The light can be used against the enemy



The light can do all that and many more!

THE DARKNESS



"A thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy." John 10:10

This evil entity will stop at nothing to make sure you'll never wake up again. He will do his best to attack, lie, manipulate, and lure you into darkness only the true source of "The Light" can defeat him.

data.short_description: Lost In The Storm is a single-player first-person mystery game with a little bit of puzzle-solving and action in between. The game is set in Andrew's deep subconscious using "The Light" A lantern God has given him to defend himself against the darkness and guide him to wake up from his coma.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.14.x (Mojave) or higher
  • Processor: 3.3GHz Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
